name: jsobj-analyzer
description: Provides information about structure of a JavaScript object.

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && uglifyjs ./src/jsoa.js > ./dist/jsoa.min.js -b beautify=false,preamble="'/*! JavaScript Object structure analyzer - v0.1 - 2018; Licensed MIT */'"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "Upgrade to %s" && npm publish && rm -rf ./dist

author: Antony Belov <cerberus.ab@mail.ru>
